00018 #ifndef _IHISTOGRAM_H
00019 #define _IHISTOGRAM_H
00020 
00021 #include <votca/ctp/qmpair.h>
00022 #include <votca/ctp/paircalculator.h>
00023 #include <votca/tools/histogramnew.h>
00024 
00025 namespace votca { namespace ctp {
00026 
00027 
00036 class Ihistogram : public PairCalculator
00037 {
00038 public:
00039     Ihistogram() {};
00040     ~Ihistogram() {};
00041 
00042 //    const char *Description() { return "Histogram of transfer integrals of neighbor list pairs"; }
00043 
00044     void Initialize(QMTopology *top, Property *options);
00045     void EvaluatePair(QMTopology *top, QMPair *pair);
00046     void EndEvaluate(QMTopology *top);
00047 
00048 private:
00049     HistogramNew histogram;
00050     double _min, _max;
00051     int _nbins;
00052     string _outfile;
00053 };
00054 
00055 inline void Ihistogram::Initialize(QMTopology *top, Property *options){
00056     _min = options->get("options.ihistogram.min").as<double>();
00057     _max = options->get("options.ihistogram.max").as<double>();
00058     _nbins = options->get("options.ihistogram.nbins").as<int>();
00059     _outfile = options->get("options.ihistogram.file").as<string>();
00060 
00061     histogram.Initialize(_min,_max,_nbins);
00062 }
00063 
00064 inline void Ihistogram::EndEvaluate(QMTopology *top){
00065     cout << "Writing Distribution of Log10(J_eff^2) to file " << _outfile << endl;
00066     histogram.data().Save(_outfile);
00067 }
00068 
00069 inline void Ihistogram::EvaluatePair(QMTopology *top, QMPair *pair){
00070     double logJ2eff = log10(pair->calcJeff2());
00071     histogram.Process( logJ2eff );
00072 }
00073 
00074 }}

00076 #endif  /* _IHISTOGRAM_H */
